searchmethod: termsearch <- function(lookup, terms) {stringr::str_detect(lookup, stringr::regex(paste(terms, collapse = '|'), ignore_case = TRUE))}; initial <- dplyr::filter(DATA, termsearch(COLUMN, SEARCHTERMS)); excluded <- dplyr::filter(initial, termsearch(COLUMN, EXCLUSIONTERMS); final <- dplyr::setdiff(inital, excluded)

searchterms: [X]Cereb infarct due unsp occlus/stenos precerebr arteries
[X]Cerebrl infarctn due/unspcf occlusn or sten/cerebrl artrs

exclusionterms: National Institutes of Health stroke scale

searchterms: Cerebral infarct due to thrombosis of precerebral arteries
Cerebral infarction due to embolism of cerebral arteries
Cerebral infarction due to embolism of precerebral arteries
Cerebral infarction due to occlusion of precerebral artery
Cerebral infarction due to thrombosis of cerebral arteries
Cerebrl infarctn due/unspcf occlusn or sten/cerebrl artrs
CVA - cerebrovascular accident due to cerebral artery occlusion
Stroke due to cerebral arterial occlusion
